results.name: You're dead but a wizard, Garry!

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
